SELECT A.seq ,A.use_yn ,A.del_yn ,A.reg_id ,A.reg_dtm ,A.upd_id ,A.upd_dtm ,A.if_id ,A.source_input_data ,A.source_mapping_data ,A.source_procedure_data ,A.source_output_data ,A.target_input_data ,A.target_mapping_data ,A.target_procedure_data ,A.target_output_data FROM tb_interface_mapping_detail A WHERE A.seq = #{seq}
